GameSetting Class

class GameSetting

This class represents the game settings.

FPS

Frames per second.

TITLE_FPS

Frames per second for the title screen.

COUNTDOWN_FPS

Frames per second for countdown.

PLAYER_SELECT_FPS

Frames per second for player selection.

CREDITS_FPS

Frames per second for credits.

LEVEL_OVER_LAG

Level over lag time.

TITLE_SCREEN

Boolean indicating whether the title screen is active.

COUNTDOWN

Boolean indicating whether countdown is active.

PLAYER_SELECT

Boolean indicating whether player selection is active.

FULL_SCREEN

Boolean indicating whether full screen is enabled.

FRAME_RATE

Frame rate.

DIMENSIONS

Screen dimensions.

MUSIC_VOLUME

Volume for music.

SEGMENT_HEIGHT

Height of game segment.

RUMBLE_LENGTH

Rumble length.

DRAW_DISTANCE

Draw distance.

ROAD_WIDTH

Width of the road.

LANES

Number of lanes.

BOUNDS

Bounds.

TUNNEL_BOUNDS

Tunnel bounds.

TUNNEL_HEIGHT

Tunnel height.

TUNNEL_LIGHT_FREQ

Frequency of tunnel lights.

AUTO_DRIVE

Boolean indicating whether auto-drive is enabled.

PLAYER_ANIM_HOLD

Player animation hold time.

CHECKPOINT

Checkpoint value.

LAP_DIFFICULTY_FACTOR

Lap difficulty factor.

LAPS_PER_LEVEL

Number of laps per level.

MINIMUM_DIFFICULTY

Minimum difficulty level.

MINIMUM_ENGINE_DIST

Minimum engine distance.

CRASH_DIVISOR

Crash divisor.

POINTS

Points.

CHANCE_OF_BONUSES

Chance of bonuses.

POINT_GAIN_PROSTITUTE

Point gain from prostitutes.

POINT_LOSS_SPRITE

Point loss for sprites.

POINT_LOSS_COMP

Point loss for competitors.

POINT_MILESTONE

Point milestone.

MINIMUM_CORNER_SMOKE

Minimum corner smoke.

FIELD_OF_VIEW

Field of view in degrees.

CAMERA_HEIGHT

Camera height.

CAMERA_DEPTH

Camera depth.

BOTTOM_OFFSET

Bottom offset.

SPEED_BOOST_DECREASE

Speed boost decrease.

SPEED_BOOST_LENGTH

Speed boost length.

HARD_TOP_SPEED

Hard top speed.

HARD_HANDLING

Hard handling values.

HARD_ACCELERATION

Hard acceleration values.

PLAYER_Z

Player Z position.

FONTS

Dictionary containing font paths.

COLOURS

Dictionary containing color values.

LEVELS

List of level dictionaries.

PLAYERS

List of player dictionaries.

SPRITES

Dictionary containing sprite information.
